Authors: Yel M.B., Sfenrianto S., Meistiawan E.T.
Title: An adaptive e-leaming model based on myers-briggs type indicator(MBTI)
Source title: Proceedings of the 3rd International Conference on Informatics and Computing, ICIC 2018
Affiliations: Faculty of Computer Science, STI and KOM CKI, Jakarta, Indonesia; Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program, Master of Information System Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Yel, M.B., Faculty of Computer Science, STI and KOM CKI, Jakarta, Indonesia; Sfenrianto, S., Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program, Master of Information System Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Meistiawan, E.T., Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program, Master of Information System Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia
Abstract: Adaptive e-learning system is widely used to customize the content of teaching materials to student learning styles. This study aims to propose an adaptive e-learning model that is able to determine the MBTI learning styles of students. It can be used by the system as to provide learning materials or e-learning activities in each phase of learning. In this study, adaptive e-learning model there are learning sessions namely: Introduction, Content, Assignment, and Exercise. Each learning session is based on MBTI learning style. © 2018 IEEE.
Author Keywords: Adaptive; E-learning; Learning aterial; Learning style; MBTI
